config.pingnametags.title: Ping Nametags
config.pingnametags.enabled.description: Whether ping nametags are enabled or not.
config.pingnametags.toggleEnabledKey.des: The key that toggles ping nametags.
config.pingnametags.pingTextPosition.des: The position of the ping text placed next to the name.
config.pingnametags.pingTextFormatString: The format string for ping text. Must include a %d, which will be replaced dynamically by the actual ping value.
